features.featureTitle: Update the Pre‑Meditation page layout so the “More details” button with id '1dl1fqs' is positioned at the bottom of the guide container within the parent container '1j6s3jt' (the selected element at XPath `/html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[3]`). The button should remain at the bottom of that container regardless of guide content height (i.e., guide content above, button pinned to the bottom).
